name: Invisible Friends Game BLUE
description:
BLUE Edition (Inspired by kunected#0001)

For the Invisible Friends community!

Invisible Friends Game by Kian#3451 & Matrix#0903

We worked really hard on this project and it took countless hours to complete. Please enjoy your time playing!

Game Info:

This is an arcade-style parkour run and gun game and the objective is to dodge incoming bullets, defeat enemies, and make it to the end! Beware, a dragon guards the end of the level. But don't worry! There are checkpoints all over the level and each time you die, you respawn with full health. This is a hardcore game at its finest, so please refrain from raging due to failure. Don't give up, you got this! There may be a few bugs since this is the first build but overall, it runs very well. 

ENJOY :) <33333

TIPS:  

- Strafe bullets by moving with a high velocity and jumping.

- Remember on platforms you can use friction to stick to your landings.

- Vault jump when stuck to the side of a platform to generate more momentum.

Controls:

W = Jump

A = Run Left

D = Run Right

Space / Left Click = Shoot

Move Cursor = Look Around / Aim

INFO: 

- Enemies can take up to 3 direct hits before death. The dragon can take 50.

- Mobile (IOS & Android) integration not yet supported.
